price: 但しルート*の一族だけは別で、本当に私たちは、彼ら全員を必ずや救います。
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
